    • Constructor Detail

      • Passenger

        Passenger​(java.lang.String passengerName,
          Floor destinationFloor)
        A Passenger object is defined using the an identifier and the destination of a person. They can then be placed on a floor from which they will be transported to the destination.
        Parameters:
        passengerName - The description/name/identifier of a person using an elevator
        destinationFloor - The destination floor of the person

    • Method Detail

      • askToEnterFloor

        boolean askToEnterFloor​(Floor floor)
        A person only enters a floor from the elevator, if it is the destination. It will return false in any other case.
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor which the passenger may want to enter from the elevator
        Returns:
        False in any case, except the given floor is the destination of the passenger

      • askToLeaveFloor

        boolean askToLeaveFloor​(Floor floor)
        Ask a person leaving a floor (using the Elevator). The passenger agrees to leave any floor, except for the destination floor.
        Parameters:
        floor - A floor from which the passenger should use the elevator to get to the destination
        Returns:
        True in any case, except when asked to leave its destination.

      • canReachDestination

        boolean canReachDestination​(Floor from,
                            Floor to)
        A person can determine, if it wants to take the elevator when given the position of the elevator and its destination. The function will return try, if the destination of the passenger is between the position and destination of the elvator.
        Parameters:
        from - The current position of the elevator
        to - The destination of the elevator
        Returns:
        The passenger can enter and reach its destination when taking this elevator

      • getPassengerName

        public java.lang.String getPassengerName()
        Getter for the name of the passenger name
        Returns:
        The identifer/name/description of a passenger

      • getDestinationFloor

        public Floor getDestinationFloor()
        Getter for the destination of the passenger
        Returns:
        The floor the passenger wants to reach
